Title: An Act Changing the Name of Tangub Emergency Hospital in the City of Tangub to Doña Maria D. Tan Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 98
An Act Changing the Name of Tangub Emergency Hospital in the City of Tangub to Doña Maria D. Tan Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of Tangub Emergency Hospital in the City of Tangub is hereby changed to Doña Maria D. Tan Memorial Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: December 27, 1980
